name: Augur il-Vec
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

oracle_text:
{1}{B}: Regenerate Augur of Skulls.

name: Aven Augur
oracle_text:
Flying

flavor_text: "I have seen the future. It does not include you."
